description: Try our easy to follow Streaky Bacon & Mushroom Carbonara recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Carbonara,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Mushroom,Peanut free
name: Streaky Bacon & Mushroom Carbonara Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g swiss brown mushrooms, sliced or quartered

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large saucepan of water to the boil.
Meanwhile, heat half the oil in a frying pan, add bacon and cook until golden and crisp. Set aside and wipe out pan.
Add remaining oil to pan with the mushrooms, cooking until golden.
Return bacon to the pan with the garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Add LatinaTM Fresh Egg Fettuccine to boiling water and return to the boil, cooking for 2 minutes or until al dente. Drain.
Pour the Bulla Cooking Cream and stock into the mushrooms with the Mil Lel Grated Parmesan cheese, mixing well and bring to a simmer. Season to taste. Toss in the cooked pasta and parsley.
Serve sprinkled with additional Mil Lel Grated or Shredded Parmesan if desired.
